com.solvvy.features

Class FeatureVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mahout.math.AbstractVector
      • org.apache.mahout.math.RandomAccessSparseVector
        • com.solvvy.features.FeatureVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Iterable<org.apache.mahout.math.Vector.Element>, org.apache.mahout.math.Vector
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FeatureVectorWithSource

    public class FeatureVector
extends org.apache.mahout.math.RandomAccessSparseVector
    A feature vector for text snippets. They are represented sparsely.
